endpoint.description: The subdomain part of the endpoint assigned by Arukas. If it is not set, Arukas will do automatic assignment.

image.description: The ID of the image to back this container.It must be a public image on DockerHub.

instances.description: The count of the instance. It must be between 1 and 10.

plan.description: The plan of the Arukas. It must be free or hobby or standard-1 or standard-2.
